subtitleNullable: IndiaTV News Dataset for summarization and classification task
descriptionNullable:
The IndiaTV News Dataset has been meticulously curated to serve as a foundational resource for deep learning research, specifically targeting content summarization and heading classification tasks. Obtained through web scraping from the IndiaTV news website, this dataset encompasses a comprehensive collection of news articles, featuring both the complete article content and concise short descriptions. The inclusion of entire articles provides a rich corpus for training deep learning models to understand and process extensive textual information. Additionally, the accompanying short descriptions offer valuable targets for text summarization tasks.

**Note**: Researchers are kindly urged to uphold ethical guidelines, respect the terms of use outlined by the data source, and refrain from any commercial use of the scraped data.
